metadata.title: RA Family: Do I need to use an external USB-to-UART converter to communicate with the microcontroller ?

sections.content:
Question:
Do I need to use an external USB-to-UART converter to communicate with the microcontroller ?
Answer:
No, the J-Link OB chip on the VOICE kit provides USB-to-UART functionality alongside standard J-Link debugging capabilities.
Suitable Products
MCU : RA4E1 or RA6E1
LDO : RAA214220
Op-Amp : READ2302G
QSPI : AT25SF641B
